name: CCNATrainer
0:
”Alexa, open C. C. N. A. Trainer”
”Alexa, ask C. C. N. A. Trainer for a review question”
”Alexa, tell C. C. N. A. Trainer to give me a ccna fact”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: c. c. n. a. trainer
des: Use this handy skill to review or prepare for the CCNA exam certification based on topics presented in the ICND II class. Just ask "C. C. N. A. Trainer" to give you a question and then you can ask for more. The skill will continue to provide questions until you say "no" or "exit". Good luck!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
